ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
//重定向和导入书架处理
let i = String(book.bookUrl).includes('https:/');
if (i) {
	book.bookUrl = `data:;base64,${java.base64Encode(baseUrl.replace(/,{or.+/,''))},{"type":"bax"}`;
	//注意入库origin
	}

//告诉目录是由详情来的
java.put('sx1',1);
let nn=getsurl();

//发书评功能
let bkbl = book.getVariable("custom");
//解书籍地址
let ml = String(book.bookUrl).replace(/.+,(.+),.+/,'$1');
let mlj = java.base64Decode(ml);
let [, bkid=''] = mlj.match(/book\/(\d+)/)||[];
//↑获取书id
java.put('bkid',bkid);

if (bkbl=='🔒'||bkbl=='') {
//带🔒或书籍变量为空会经过这里
//处理加书架功能
let sj=java.get('sj');
let sj2=source.get('8xsj'); //启用同步的标识
if (sj=='2'&&sj2=='1') {java.put('sj',3);tbshujia(nn,bkid);}
else if (sj=='1') {java.put('sj',2);}

} else if (bkbl=='目录') {
	//清空最新章储存强制刷新目录
	java.put('8xzx','');
	//清空输入的书籍变量
	book.putCustomVariable('');
} else {
let pfurl = nn+'/modules/article/rating.php';
let plurl = nn+'/modules/article/reviews.php';
let ck = source.getLoginHeader()||'';
let cki = ck.match(/UserToken%3D([^%]+)/)||['',''];
tk = cki[1];
//↑获取链接和tk

if (bkid != '' && tk != '') {
let tm = new Date().getTime();
let bkfs = (bkbl.match(/^(\d|10)分$/) || ['','0'])[1];
let pfbody = `score=${bkfs}&id=${bkid}&ajax_request=${tm}`;
let plbody = `ptitle=&act=newpost&jieqi_token=${tk}&Submit=&pcontent=${bkbl}&aid=${bkid}&ajax_request=${tm}`;

let headers = gethd();
headers['Referer']=mlj;
headers["Cookie"]=ck;
let url='',body='';
if (bkfs != 0) {url=pfurl;body=pfbody;}
else {url=plurl;body=plbody;}
//清空输入的书籍变量
book.putCustomVariable('');
let by = java.connect(url+','+JSON.stringify(
    	{"method": "POST",
    	"header":headers,
    	"body":body})
    	).body();
java.longToast("\n"+java.htmlFormat(by));
//随机延时0-1秒
let tim = Math.floor(Math.random()*1001);
Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(tim);
cache.deleteMemory('baxxq'+bkid);
	} else if (tk == '') {java.toast('未登录');}
}

//先发评论再访问刷新
if (!i) {
	//跳转时，src为源码
	let tt = java.hexDecodeToString(src);
	//不要直接访问tt
	tt=String(tt).replace(/http.{4}[A-z\d\.]+/,'');
let option={};
option["headers"]=gethd();
	const startTime=new Date().getTime();
	result = cache.getFromMemory('baxxq'+bkid) || java.ajax(nn+tt+','+JSON.stringify(option))+'';
	const endTime=new Date().getTime();
	let speed = (endTime - startTime)/1000;
	if (speed>39) {java.toast('\n详情页访问延迟过长：'+speed.toFixed()+'秒');}	
}
	java.setContent(result);

//内容判断
let name=java.getString('class.divbox cf@span.0@text||.mbs@ownText')+[];
name=name.replace(/^《|》$/g,'');
let author=java.getString('class.divbox cf@span.1@a@text')+[];
if (author=='')
[,author]=(gets(".gray@ownText").match(/^(.+) 著/))||[];
if (name) {
	cache.putMemory('baxxq'+bkid,result);
	book.name=String(book.name)||name;
	book.author=String(book.author)||author;
//放入书名
let Info=source.getLoginInfoMap()||{};
Info['书名'] = book.name;
source.putLoginInfo(JSON.stringify(Info));
//放入ID和书名。正式版该语法会报错
cache.putMemory('8xid',{[bkid]: book.name});

	if (book.name!=name) {
			let sm=source.get('8xsm'),sm1=java.get('sm1');
			//sm功能标记，sm1判断标记
			if (sm1=='') {
			//书名不同，仅记录
			java.put('sm1',1);
			} else if (sm=='1') {
				book.name=name;
				java.toast("已自动更新书名");
			} else if (sm1=='1') {
				java.longToast("详情页获取的书名：\n《"+name+"》");
				java.log("书名："+name);
				java.put('sm1',2);
			}
			
}	else if (book.author!=author) {
	// book.author=author;
	//仅输出日志
java.log("获取的作者不同，作者："+author);}
	
	//书名和作者正常由此过
	}
else {
	//书名加载失败
	gengxin();
	java.toast("详情页加载失败，请刷新重试");
}
	result
</js>

let zxh=zxe.attr("href").replaceAll("http.{4}[^\\/]+",'');
let zx = java.get('8xzx');
if (zx==zxh) java.put('ww',0);
else {java.put('8xzx',zxh);java.put('ww',1);}
java.put("8xzxt",zxe.text())

r1||r2

ruleContent.content:
<js>
const startTime3=new Date().getTime();
let bin = book.durChapterIndex;
let cin = chapter.index;
let inn = cin - bin;
let dn = source.get('8xdn');
let sleep = Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep;
//java.log(chapter.title+'inn：'+inn);
if ((inn==-4||inn==4)&&dn!=1) {java.longToast('\n使用下载需要在书源登录界面开启功能\n建议预下载设定不要大于3');}

let nn=getsurl();

let tim = Math.floor(Math.random()*2001);
let ii = 1;
//手动限制并发,下载时(0-2*30秒随机)

function delayl(ll){
	sleep(tim);
let dtm=Date.now()+(3000+tim)*10; //30-50秒
	while (dn!=1) {
Packages.java.util.concurrent.locks.LockSupport.parkNanos(this,30*1e6); //过大时js在此中断会异常//java.log(innx);//log时能较稳定重载
		let innx = cin - book.durChapterIndex;
	if (innx==0) return;
	else if (innx==-1&&Date.now()<dtm) continue;
	else {ii=0;return;}
		}
		
		let baxtime = cache.getFromMemory('baxtime2');
	 if (baxtime<Date.now()) baxtime=Date.now();
	 baxtime+=20000;
	cache.putMemory('baxtime2',baxtime);
	while(Date.now()<baxtime) {
	Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(3000);}
	sleep(tim*30);//30*2秒
}

switch(inn) {
	case 0: break;
	case 1: sleep(1000+tim); break;
	case 2: sleep(4500+tim); break;
	case 3: sleep(7500+tim); break;
	case -1: delayl(-1); break;
	case -2: delayl(-2); break;
	case -3: delayl(-3); break;
	default: dn==1 ? delayl(0) : ii=0; break;
}

//延时结束
let bkid = java.get('bkid'); //两个putm用

if (inn==0||inn==1) {
//放入书名和id
cache.putMemory('8xid',{[bkid]: book.name});
let Info=source.getLoginInfoMap()||{};
Info['书名'] = book.name;
source.putLoginInfo(JSON.stringify(Info));
// 本地阅读进度
let sjj=source.get('sj'+bkid)+'';
if (java.get('sj')==3||sjj) {	source.put('sj'+bkid,book.author+','+book.durChapterTitle+','+book.durChapterIndex);}
}

let tt = java.hexDecodeToString(result);
tt=String(tt).replace(/https\:\/{2}[A-z\d\.]+/,'');
//java.log('正文地址：'+tt);
let ml = String(book.tocUrl).replace(/.+,(.+),.+/,'$1');
let mlj = java.base64Decode(ml);

let [,cid]=tt.match(/(\d+)\.html/)||[,''];

if (ii) {
//↓第一次访问正文
try {
		let baxtime = cache.getFromMemory('baxtime');
	 if (baxtime<Date.now()) baxtime=Date.now();
	 baxtime+=2000;
	let dtm=Date.now()+(3000+tim)*10;
	cache.putMemory('baxtime',baxtime);
	let li=(Date.now()<baxtime||cache.getFromMemory('bxvip'+bkid))&&Date.now()<dtm;
	while(li) {
		Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(1000);
		li=(Date.now()<baxtime||cache.getFromMemory('bxvip'+bkid))&&Date.now()<dtm&&(cin-book.durChapterIndex!=0);
source.get('bx调试模式')==1&&java.log(chapter.title+'🍊'+li+'🍊');}
cache.putMemory('bxvip'+bkid,true);

let option={};
option["headers"]=gethd();
const startTime=new Date().getTime();

if (cid) {
//	if (bkid < 1000) n = 0;
//	else n = bkid.slice(0,-3);
//	result = java.ajax('https://js.8xsk.org/'+n+'/'+bkid+'/'+cid+'.js'+','+JSON.stringify(option)).replaceAll(String.raw`^document.write\('|'\);$`,'');
	} else {
	[,cid]=tt.match(/cid=(\d+)/)||[,''];
	let ck=source.getLoginHeader()||'';
	if (ck) option["headers"]["Cookie"]=ck;}
	result = java.ajax(nn+tt+','+JSON.stringify(option));
	result = java.getString('[id*="content"]@html',result);
	
const endTime=new Date().getTime();
let speed = (endTime - startTime)/1000;
if (speed>39) java.toast('\n正文页访问延迟过长：'+speed.toFixed()+'秒');
//复原手机版链接，干掉字数统计。重新刷新时不为这个链接，不会导致二次加载

//拦截超时报错
} catch (e) {if (/timeout/.test(e)) java.toast('正文超时'); else {inn==0&&java.toast('正文异常：'+e);}
java.log('八叉正文出错：'+e);}
// if ii 结束
	} else {result='';}
//inn>1时为空，软件会自动重新获取
let rr = java.getString('class.mt mb@a@text||class.tc mb@a@text||class.block mt@button@text',result);
//内容识别
if (rr.includes("登录")) {
	java.toast("💎请重新登录书源账号");
	result='';}
else if (rr.includes("充值")||rr.includes("确定订阅")) {
let url = nn+'/modules/obook/buychapter.php';
let ck = source.getLoginHeader()+'';
let [,tk] = ck.match(/UserToken%3D([^%]+)/)||[,''];
let body = `buytype=0&act=buy&jieqi_token=${tk}&cid=${cid}&submit=`;

let option={};
option["headers"]=gethd();
option["headers"]['Referer']=tt;
option["headers"]["Cookie"]=ck;
option["method"]="POST";
option["body"]=body;
if (tk && nn && cid) {
	try {
	sleep(2100-tim);
	let pt = java.connect(url+','+JSON.stringify(option));
  let lc = pt.url()+'';
  if (lc.includes('/read/')||lc.includes('/obook/')) {
  	java.toast("已为你自动购买");
  	result = pt.body();}
  	else if (lc.includes('buychapter')) {
  		java.toast('购买失败\n检测到未重定向');
  		result = pt.body();
  		result = java.getString('[id*="content"]@html',result);}
  	else java.toast('购买异常');
 	} catch (err) {java.longToast("💔VIP内容获取失败"); result='';}
} else if (!tk) {java.toast("💎书源未获取到登录信息"); result='';} else java.longToast('nn或cid为空');
} else {
//无VIP登录
}
cache.deleteMemory('bxvip'+bkid);//不能put(false，java和js转化问题

const endTime3=new Date().getTime();
source.get('bx调试模式')==1&&java.toast(nn+tt+"时间"+(endTime3-startTime3)/1000);
//检查
if ([19,339].includes(cin)&&Math.abs(inn)<4) gengxin();
result
</js>

<js>

result=java.getString(source.ruleSearch.author+[])+'';
else if (/http.{4}www/.test(this.getsurl()))
result = gets("td.2@text||span:contains(作者：)+span@text");
else
result = gets('td.1@a.-1@span@ownText').replace(/^\//,'')||gets(".gray@textNodes").replace(/.+\ \|\ |\n.*/g,'');

if (result == '[email protected]') {
	let hex = java.getString('.__cf_email__.0@data-cfemail')+'';
	result = decodeEmail(hex,0);
	}
else if (baseUrl.includes('/bookcase.php') ) {
	java.put('sj',3); //标识已经同步了书架，作者名称读取缓存
	let sj=source.get('sj'+java.get('bkid'));
	result=sj.split(',')[0]||'';
	}
	result
</js>
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
if (baseUrl.startsWith('http://localhost') ) {
		result = [];
}
else if (baseUrl.includes('search.php?') ) {
let r1 = java.getString('#content .blockcontent@text');
if (r1.includes("错误原因")) {java.longToast(r1);result = [];}
else {result = java.getElement('#jieqi_page_contents>div');}
	}
else if (baseUrl.includes('/book/') ){
java.toast('暂不支持重定向结果');
result=[];
	}
else if (baseUrl.includes('/bookcase.php') ) {
	//我的书架
		let ts= java.getString('table@caption@ownText||#jieqi_page_contents@ownText');
	ts=String(ts).replace(/.*(可收藏 .+已收藏[^，。]+).*$/,'\n$1');
	source.get('sjts')!=ts&&ts&&java.toast('\n'+ts);
	source.put('sjts',ts);
	Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(100);
	if (/http.{4}www/.test(this.getsurl()))
	result = java.getElement('table tr:has(a)');
	else result = java.getElements('#content div[class="c_row cf"]');
	}
else {
result = java.getElements('#jieqi_page_contents>tr||#content div[class="c_row cf"]');
}
result
</js>

ruleExplore.intro:
<js>
if (baseUrl.includes('search.php?'))
result=java.getString(source.ruleSearch.intro+[])+'';
else if (/http.{4}www/.test(this.getsurl()))
result = gets('td.3@text||.c_description@text');
else
result = gets('td.2@text')||gets(".gray@textNodes").match(/\n(.+)/)[1];
if (baseUrl.includes("top/words")) {'⠀\n字数：'+(result/10000).toFixed(2)+'万'}
else if (baseUrl.includes("top/goodnum")) {'⠀\n收藏数：'+result}
//新书榜
else if (baseUrl.includes("top/newhot")) {
	result = result>9999 ? 	(result/10000).toFixed(2)+'万' : result;
	'⠀\n点击数：'+result}
else if (baseUrl.includes("top/signtime")) {
  let t = parseInt(result)*1000;
  let time = java.timeFormatUTC(t,"⠀\n签约时间：yy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss",8*60*60*1000);
  time}
else if (baseUrl.includes("top/lastupdate")) {'⠀\n字数：'+(result/10000).toFixed(2)+'万'}
else if (baseUrl.includes("top/postdate")) {'⠀\n入库时间：'+result}
else if (baseUrl.includes("top/allvisit")) {
	result = result>999 ? 	(result/10000).toFixed(2)+'万' : result;
	'⠀\n总点击：'+result}
else if (baseUrl.includes("top/monthvisit")) {

else if (baseUrl.includes("top/weekvisit")) {
	result = result>9999 ? 	(result/10000).toFixed(2)+'万' : result;
	'⠀\n周点击：'+result}
else if (baseUrl.includes("top/allvote")) {'⠀\n总推荐：'+result}
else if (baseUrl.includes("top/monthvote")) {'⠀\n月推荐：'+result}
else if (baseUrl.includes("top/weekvote")) {'⠀\n周推荐：'+result}
else if (/articlelist|sort\/|search\.php/.test(baseUrl)) {
//含简介(搜索会经此)
result.replace('「','“').replace('」','”').replace(/\s+/g,' ')}
else if (baseUrl.includes('/bookcase.php') ) {

	(sj==''||sj=='null')?'':'\u200b\n当前阅读进度：'+sj;
	}
else {''}
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
const startTime3=new Date().getTime();
const dyy=baseUrl.endsWith('"ml"}');
let tim0 = Math.floor(Math.random()*51);
Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(tim0);
let nn=getsurl();
let sj=java.get('sj');
if (sj=='') java.put('sj',1); //书架标识
let ww = java.get('ww'),
sx1 = java.get('sx1'); //ww是否有新章，sx刷新标识从目录来(已在书架才会触发)
java.put('sx1',0); //还原详情到目录标识
let sj2=source.get('8xsj'); //启用同步的标识
let bkid=java.get('bkid');
let tt = java.hexDecodeToString(result);
tt=String(tt).replace(/https\:\/{2}[A-z\d\.]+/,'');
if (sj!='3'&&sx1!='1'&&sj2=='1'&&bkid!=''&&dyy) {tbshujia(nn,bkid)&&java.put('sj',3);}
//不为3未加书架，不为1不过详情，为1开启功能，且参数不为空
let sjj=source.get('sj'+bkid)+'';
if (sjj&&book.durChapterIndex==0) {
	//反向同步进度
	let num=sjj.split(',')[2];
	num>0&&(book.durChapterIndex=num);}
else if (java.get('sj')==3&&!sjj) {
	//标记进源储存
source.put('sj'+bkid,book.author+','+book.durChapterTitle+','+book.durChapterIndex);}

function mlurl(){
	let tim=(Math.random()*1001|0)+(dyy?500:0);
	Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(tim);
let option={};
option["headers"]=gethd();
	const startTime=new Date().getTime();
	result = java.ajax(nn+tt+','+JSON.stringify(option))+'';
	const endTime=new Date().getTime();
	let speed = (endTime - startTime)/1000;
	speed>39&&java.toast(book.name+'\n目录页访问延迟过长：'+speed.toFixed()+'秒');
	if (/^java\.net|^error/.test(result))
	java.toast(book.name+'目录链接访问出错'+result),java.log('目录访问出错'+result);
	else {
		result=java.getString('.main@html',result)+'';
		let tim1 = Math.floor(Math.random()*13);
		let tim11 = Math.floor(Math.random()*5);
		if (result.length<1339)
		java.toast(book.name+'目录内容出错'),java.log('目录内容出错：'+result);
		else if (result.includes(zx)||zx=='')
		cache.put(`v_${source.getKey()}_${nn+tt}`,result,60*(30+tim11)*(1+tim1));
		else
		cache.put(`v_${source.getKey()}_${nn+tt}`,result,3600*(20+tim11)*(10+tim1));}
}
function delay(dyt){
		 let baxtime = cache.getFromMemory('baxtime');
	 if (baxtime<Date.now()) baxtime=Date.now();
	 baxtime+=dyt;
	cache.putMemory('baxtime',baxtime);
	while(Date.now()<baxtime) {
	Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(1000);}
	}

result=cache.get(`v_${source.getKey()}_${nn+tt}`)+'';
let zx='';
if (result.length>399) {
	if (ww==1) {
	let wwz=java.getString('.pages a:contains(下一页)@href',result)+'';
	if (wwz.length<3) {
	delay(3000);
	mlurl();
	java.put('ww',0);} }

} else {
let xqy = cache.getFromMemory('baxxq'+bkid);
if (!xqy) {
delay(3000);
let option={};
option["headers"]=gethd();
let xq = String(book.bookUrl).replace(/.+,(.+),.+/,'$1');
xq = java.base64Decode(xq);
xq=String(xq).replace(/http.{4}[A-z\d\.]+/,'');
	const startTime2=new Date().getTime();
xqy=java.ajax(nn+xq+','+JSON.stringify(option))+'';
	const endTime2=new Date().getTime();
	let speed2 = (endTime2 - startTime2)/1000;
	if (speed2>39) {java.toast(book.name+'\n详情页访问延迟过长：'+speed2.toFixed()+'秒');}	
}
if (!/^java\.net|^error/.test(xqy))
zx=gete(".divbox h3 a||span:contains(最新：)+a",xqy).attr("href").replaceAll("http.{4}[^\\/]+",'')+''||java.get('8xzx');

if (sx1!='1') {
	//从目录
	delay(3000);
	}
mlurl();
}
java.setContent(result);
result=java.getElement('.index dd, .index dt');
result=Array.from(result).map(x=>{
	let a=x.select("a,dt").first();
	let u=java.base64Encode(a.attr("href").replaceAll('^http.{4}[^\\/]+',''));
	return {
	"n":(a.ownText()+'').replace(/\([01]\d-[0123]\d\)$/,''),
	"u":`data:;base64,${u},{"type":"zw"}`,
	"i":(a.attr("title")+'').replace(/\d{1,2}\:\d{1,2}更新，共(\d+字).*/,' $1')+(x.select("em")+''?" 💎":""),
	"v":x.select("dt")};
});
const endTime3=new Date().getTime();
source.get('bx调试模式')==1&&java.toast(nn+tt+"时间"+(endTime3-startTime3)/1000);
result
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
let nn = getsurl();
let url = `${nn}/modules/article/search.php`;
if (key.startsWith('书名：'))
url += `?searchkey=${key.substr(3)}&searchtype=articlename&page=${page}`;
else if (key.startsWith('作者：'))
url += `?searchkey=${key.substr(3)}&searchtype=author&page=${page}`;
else if (key.startsWith('标签：'))
url += `?searchkey=${key.substr(3)}&searchtype=keywords&page=${page}`;
else
url +=	`?searchkey=${key}&searchtype=all&page=${page}`;
let option={};
option["headers"]=gethd();
url+','+JSON.stringify(option);
</js>
variableComment:
♦书籍变量：
　 ①填写  🔒 并刷新，关闭本书评论显示
　 ②填写“目录”并刷新，强制刷新目录
　 ③填写分数并刷新，使用分数进行评分
　 ④填写其它并刷新，内容作为评论发送
分数格式示意“1分”“2分”…“10分”

㊟默认详情页检测到有更新内容时才会刷新目录

！注意区分源变量和书籍变量
